title: Summer New Product Promotion
brief: Promote our new summer product line, aiming to increase sales and brand exposure.
goals: Increase brand awareness, boost website traffic by 30%, achieve 25% sales growth
description: Summer series product promotion, including new clothing, accessories, and home goods.

title: Member Loyalty Program
brief: Establish a loyalty program for existing customers to encourage repeat purchases and improve retention rates.
goals: Increase customer lifetime value, boost membership sign-ups, improve repeat purchase rate
description: Provide special discounts, priority purchase rights, and exclusive events for loyal customers.

title: Content Marketing Strategy
brief: Create high-quality content to attract new audiences and establish our professional image in the industry.
goals: Increase website traffic, improve social media engagement, boost conversion rates
description: Create and distribute valuable content relevant to target audience.

title: Holiday Season Campaign
brief: Prepare special promotions for the upcoming holiday season to boost sales.
goals: Increase holiday season sales, attract new customers, clear inventory
description: Holiday limited-time offers, including special gift wrapping and delivery options.

title: Product Launch Event
brief: Plan a major launch event for the new product line.
goals: Create product awareness, gain media coverage, generate sales leads
description: Includes press conference, media interviews, and product demonstrations.

title: 刷新后不会消失的活动
brief: 通过API测试数据持久化功能
